.. _fluidtypo3-vhs-condition-type-isstring:

==================================================================
condition.type.isString ViewHelper `<vhs:condition.type.isString>`
==================================================================


Condition: Type of value is string
==================================

Condition ViewHelper which renders the `then` child if type of
provided value is string.


.. _fluidtypo3-vhs-condition-type-isstring_arguments:

Arguments
=========


.. _condition.type.isstring_then:

then
----

:aspect:`DataType`
   mixed

:aspect:`Required`
   false
:aspect:`Description`
   Value to be returned if the condition if met.

.. _condition.type.isstring_else:

else
----

:aspect:`DataType`
   mixed

:aspect:`Required`
   false
:aspect:`Description`
   Value to be returned if the condition if not met.

.. _condition.type.isstring_value:

value
-----

:aspect:`DataType`
   mixed

:aspect:`Required`
   true
:aspect:`Description`
   Value to check
